Method Detail

act

void act(float dt)
Simple universe behavior consists in incrementing its time.

Parameters:
dt - time step

lookupNewborns

Set<Agent> lookupNewborns()
Lookup newborns in the Universe. Method return data about new agents that were born on this step and will be revived on next one.

Returns:
set of AgentData instances for each new agent
